Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Fibrin Sealant Patch in Reducing Postoperative Pancreatic Fistula

Intervention.evidence: fibrin-coated collagen patch (patch group) or no patch (control group)

Objective.evidence: aimed to assess the effectiveness of a fibrin sealant patch in reducing postoperative pancreatic fistula

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was POPF, assessed up to 42 days post-surgery

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: using a secure internet-based service for allocation concealment

Number_Randomised.evidence: 71 patients were randomised to each group

Number_Analysed.evidence: All 142 patients were analysed using an intention-to-treat approach

Harms.evidence: Adverse events were similar between groups
